modShortDescription: Books that have been read have a red icon. Books that have not been read have a green icon. A second set of icons were included in case the user would like those reversed.
modDescription:
Red Eagle LXIX originally tried coloring the icons but that didnâ€™t work. He resorted to the technique he found in this [topic](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24306-mod-that-lets-you-know-youve-already-read-a-book/) of replacing the icons.

Books that have been read have a red icon. [Books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) that have not been read have a green icon. A second set of icons were included in case the user would like those reversed.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/RELXIX-7DTD/A20_XML_Modlets/tree/main/RELXIX_HighlightBookState)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25785-relxix-a20-xml-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Red Eagle LXIX](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/red-eagle-lxix/)
